transcript.text: Good morning everyone and welcome to our quarterly all-hands meeting. We have a lot to cover today including financial results, product updates, market expansion plans, and organizational changes.
First, I'm pleased to announce that we've exceeded our revenue targets for Q4 by twelve percent, reaching a total of forty-five million dollars in quarterly revenue.

Thank you John. The financial performance this quarter has been outstanding. Our gross margins improved to seventy-eight percent, and we've maintained strong cash flow with over twenty million in reserves.
Operating expenses remained well-controlled at thirty-two million, giving us a healthy operating margin of twenty-nine percent. This positions us excellently for our planned expansion initiatives.

From a technology perspective, we've made significant progress on our platform scalability. Our infrastructure now supports over one million concurrent users, and we've reduced average response times by forty percent.
